Export.Routine: loadtest(classname) write "Reading data from class: ", classname,! write "..#FileName : ",$parameter(classname,"FileName"),! set ts=$zh do $classmethod(classname,"ReadNextLine",1) write "Time to first line: ",$zh-ts,! set counter=1 set totalRead=$l(^||CSVRow) while $classmethod(classname,"ReadNextLine",1) { set counter=counter+1 set line=^||CSVRow set totalRead=totalRead+$l(line) } write "Time to last line: ",$zh-ts,! write "Total records read: ", counter,! write "Total bytes read: ", totalRead,! quit
